p: The comparison between the sum of pigments obtained from the first and second methods is shown in Figure 5 and it demonstrates a relatively good linear correlation (R 2 = 0.9376). However, as observed for the two pigments’ fractions, the method proposed by Mínguez-Mosquera et al. [ 11] provides values systematically underestimated by about 40%–60% with respect to the second method proposed by Domenici et al. [ 17].
